summary: My youngest son is a huge Mortal Kombat game fan and his favorite character is Kitana. While I know this isn\'t remotely close to any type of lore here on Skyrim I felt compelled as a father to guide him along in creation of this companion when he asked me. She is sandboxed in Jorrvaskr Hall. This is his first mod so go easy on the 7 year old... :)
descriptionHtml:
Kitana -Standalone Dual Flurry Companion-

[b]Updated to 2.0: She now has yellow eyes like in the game Mortal Kombat and I tweaked her face a little and her hair is a bit darker now.[/b] 

My son is a huge Mortal Kombat fan and his favorite character is Kitana. While I know this isn\'t remotely close to any type of lore here on Skyrim I felt compelled as a father to guide him along in creation of this companion when he asked me. This is his first mod so go easy on the 7 year old... ;)   


She is a basic follower, she will dual flurry if given two blades and uses healing. Stealth Perks: Stealth 40, Muffled Movement, Light Foot and Silent Roll
Location: Jorrvaskr Hall, Whiterun
Level 40 Calculated combat mechanics. 
CBBEv3 Slim body
UNP Fitness Body - Also CBBE by Svarog in the last two screenies I posted. 
Inventory includes one Iron Dagger and no clothes. (Yes I told him to leave the room so I could armor her up!) :D


To make her look like she does in the uploaded screenies you will need the following. 

Neo Neo Slave Leia for Skyrim - CBBE by Neovinci aka Meister
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13052
Black Tower and Black Sacrament Armor pack by AmethystDeceiver
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii ***Required***
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
Not sure where the Daedric Katana\'s came from, either Tytanis or Jaysus Swords, but \"props\" to both of them as they are outstanding authors. 
UNP Fitness Body - Also CBBE by Svarog: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16731
Thanks for looking and or trying her out!

FB & BB
author: BunnyBeans

files.name: Kitana -Standalone Kombat Companion-
files.changelogHtml: Updated to 1.2 There was a conflict in her esp file because I had her wearing Black Sacrament and saved the file without uninstalling the armor first. This should be fixed!

files.name: Kitana -Standalone Kombat Companion- Calculated Level 40
files.changelogHtml: Changed her eye color to Yellow and darkened her hair a little. I also tweaked her face just a tiny bit.
